name: cloudflare

alias.title: Credential Alias
alias.description: Friendly identifier for this Cloudflare account.

apiToken.title: API Token
apiToken.description: Scoped token with access to account settings, Zero Trust policies, and scanning features.

accountId.title: Account ID
accountId.description: Cloudflare account identifier targeted by this integration.

zoneIds.title: Zone IDs
zoneIds.description: Optional subset of zones to include when collecting findings.

email.title: Account Email
email.description: Optional email associated with the API token (required for legacy key authentication).

apiKey.title: Global API Key
apiKey.description: Optional global API key when using email/key authentication instead of scoped tokens.

enableScanner.title: Enable Scanner
enableScanner.description: Toggle Cloudflare's scanning utility if the account is licensed for it.

scannerLabel.title: Scanner Label
scannerLabel.description: Optional label recorded with scan jobs for traceability.

description: Validate Cloudflare account access and collect security-relevant account and zone context for posture workflows.
